thread.title: Officials: Black bear attacked elderly woman inside her home
thread.title_full: Officials: Black bear attacked elderly woman inside her home - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Officials: Black bear attacked elderly woman inside her home
text:
KALISPELL, Mont. (AP) â€” Wildlife officials say a black bear that seriously injured an elderly woman attacked her inside her northwestern Montana home.
Montana Fish, Wildlife and Parks spokesman John Fraley tells the Flathead Beacon newspaper of Kalispell ( http://bit.ly/1LYEWPk ) that the department doesn't know how the bear got into the woman's home Sunday, but that it left through a window.
Fraley says bears in the Kalispell area have been "extensively fed" with bird feed and other sources. He declined to say who was feeding the animals or if they might face charges.
It is illegal to provide supplemental feed to deer, elk, bears or mountain lions.
Fraley called the attack "severe." The woman remains hospitalized, and wardens are trying to trap the bear.
___
Information from: Flathead Beacon, http://www.flatheadbeacon.com
